original_text: Saying, The Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be slain, and be raised the third day.
korean_text: 이르시되 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 제삼일에 살아나야 하리라 하시고

sentences.original_text: Saying, The Son of man must suffer many things
sentences.korean_translation: 이르시되 인자가 많은 것을 받아야 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: and be rejected of the elders
and be raised the third day
